title: Caller herrin'
brief_description: A study of herring fishing in Scotland, showing the actual fishing activities of the drifters and their crews, the sampling of the catch when the fishing fleets return to port, the system of pricing the catch which ensures fair distribution, the preparation of the fish for the home market, for canning, and the kipper industry.
